content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI received three new commands to execute_shell_popen, resulting in subprocesses with PIDs 1147, 1151, and 1155. All three commands involve moving and converting a PDF file to a text file named "Rickle-Whitepaper.txt". I also received a "read_file" command to read the text file.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell_popen", "args": {"command_line": "mv /app/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/Rickle-Whitepaper.pdf Rickle-Whitepaper.pdf && pdftotext Rickle-Whitepaper.pdf Rickle-Whitepaper.txt"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_shell_popen returned: Subprocess started with PID:'1151'"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "Rickle-Whitepaper.txt"}}}'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell_popen", "args": {"command_line": "mv Rickle-Whitepaper.pdf /app/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace && cd /app/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace && pdftotext Rickle-Whitepaper.pdf Rickle-Whitepaper.txt"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_shell_popen returned: Subprocess started with PID:'1155'"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "Rickle-Whitepaper.txt"}}}'}]
